articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: This is the blog for the Advanced Analytics (AA) team of the Data Science and Advanced Analytics (DSAA) group at Unity Health Toronto
articles.contents:
We are the Advanced Analytics (AA) team within the Data Science and Advanced
Analytics (DSAA) group at Unity
Health Toronto. Our team is based at St. Michael’s Hospital.
We work on healthcare projects that aim to improve patient
outcomes and hospital efficiency.
Here, you will find blog posts written by various members of the AA
team. Blogs will be released on a monthly basis and will cover a wide
variety of topics:
Deploying machine learning algorithms in the hospital
Insights into what it’s like working in a data science team
within the healthcare setting
Summaries of our journal club discussions
Cool/interesting/fun data science things we run into in our
day-to-day work
… and more!
Happy reading!
